ModMetaData.description:

- Included the [url=https://github.com/Proxyer/FZN]japanese translation[/url] by Proxyer
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/PresetFilteredZones][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] Adds new stockpile zones which are already filtered for storing Meals, Meat, Vegetables, Medicine, Joy, Animals, etc. Storage creation is a breeze!
[h1]Workshop ID:[/h1] 1210115905
[h1]Zones Added:[/h1] [b]Meal:[/b] A zone for rottable meals [b]Medicine:[/b] A zone for anything in the medicine category [b]Meat:[/b] A zone for meats other than human and insect [b]Veg:[/b] A zone for rottable fruits, vegetables and edible seeds [b]Joy:[/b] A zone for ingestibles that give joy when consumed. Includes drugs [b]Animal:[/b] A zone for fresh animal corpses. Doesn't include insect or rotting corpses [b]Outdoor:[/b] A zone for Items and Raw Resources that will not deteriorate outside [b]Indoor:[/b] A zone for anything that deteriorates outside
[h1]Save Compatability[/h1] This mod can be added to existing saves. Always back up your saves before adding new mods as there is always the possibility for issues.
[h1]Mod Compatability[/h1] [b]!!! Industrial Rollers:[/b] These zones are not recognized by Industrial Rollers and won't work. Zones are still usable for normal hauling. No known issues yet, please report any issues
[h1]Older Versions and Update Notes[/h1] All versions of this mod can be found on my [url=https://github.com/cuproPanda/Preset-Filtered-Zones/releases]GitHub[/url]. Each release has info on what has changed from the previous release.
